docs.snippet: President Trump’s vow to impose stiff steel and aluminum tariffs has shaken financial markets and drawn plenty of international criticism.

headline.print_headline: Wall St. Gains Ground Despite Trade War Fears
headline.main: Wall St., Rattled by Fears of Trade War, Has Rocky Open Before Gaining Ground

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump is deliberately undermining faith in the American press corps. Other countries are taking note.

headline.print_headline: Mr. Trump’s War on the Truth
headline.main: The True Damage of Trump’s ‘Fake News’

docs.snippet: Yes, they have become a terrible problem. But they’re not only a problem. They do a lot of good for a lot of people.
A Trump administration proposal would limit the ability of Mexico, Canada and the U.S. to warn consumers about the dangers of foods linked to obesity.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Opposes New Warnings For Junk Food
headline.main: In Nafta Talks, U.S. Tries to Limit Junk Food Warning Labels

docs.snippet: As the list of endangered animals worldwide grows longer, society may soon be faced with an impossible decision: which ones to take off life support.

headline.print_headline: Should Some Species Be Allowed to Die Out?
headline.main: Should Some Species Be Allowed to Die Out?

docs.snippet: He wants to prohibit his agency from using certain peer-reviewed scientific studies in order to thwart regulation.

headline.main: Scott Pruitt’s Attack on Science Would Paralyze the E.P.A.

docs.snippet: A higher price for metals isn’t the main concern; it’s the chance that the global trade system will be undermined.

headline.print_headline: Not the Higher Prices, It’s What Might Happen Next
headline.main: The Real Risks of Trump’s Steel and Aluminum Tariffs

docs.snippet: Hosting Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel, the president said he still had “a good chance” of forging peace, but a deal seems further away than ever.

headline.print_headline: ‘A Neutral Guy’ Steering Closer To Israel’s Side
headline.main: Trump’s Hopes of Being the ‘Neutral Guy’ in the Mideast Seem Long Gone

docs.snippet: As gun control, immigration and taxes energize voters in both parties, allegations of an affair have intensified discomfort with the president’s behavior.

headline.print_headline: For G.O.P., Uphill Path to Win With, or Without, the President
headline.main: After Stormy Daniels, Republicans Face a Referendum on Trump’s Conduct

docs.snippet: The first lady is staying with her husband until he leaves the White House because of her devotion to her son, a reader writes.
